title: Bug 49235: ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classSet is not returning the expected class
description: Bug 49235: The ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<?>> classSet is not returning the expected class. Currently, the output is 'MySomeAnn'. However, I expect the output to be 'MySomeClass'. This issue is not yet implemented in the Servlet 3.0 specification. My code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
EB: I expect the output to be 'MySomeClass'.
